of interests and the growing competition between Google and Apple. Google Factor: But for Google, the move of Eric Schmidt is entirely official. On the management change, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision-making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. the March for Life at the US Capitol in Washington DC this week, demanding the country's Congress pass legislation ending federal funding of abortion, said a Christian Post report on the Christian Today website. Thank you for braving the cold one more time and saying to the heart of our national government, "We will fight on for life.
